--- select_unnest_with_offset_and_alias_min.sql
SELECT
  *
FROM
  UNNEST([1,2,3]) value WITH OFFSET num

--- AST
&ast.QueryStatement{
  Hint:  (*ast.Hint)(nil),
  Query: &ast.Select{
    Select:   0,
    Distinct: false,
    AsStruct: false,
    Results:  []ast.SelectItem{
      &ast.Star{
        Star: 9,
      },
    },
    From: &ast.From{
      From:   11,
      Source: &ast.Unnest{
        Unnest:   18,
        Rparen:   32,
        Implicit: false,
        Expr:     &ast.ArrayLiteral{
          Array:  0,
          Lbrack: 25,
          Rbrack: 31,
          Type:   nil,
          Values: []ast.Expr{
            &ast.IntLiteral{
              ValuePos: 26,
              ValueEnd: 27,
              Base:     10,
              Value:    "1",
            },
            &ast.IntLiteral{
              ValuePos: 28,
              ValueEnd: 29,
              Base:     10,
              Value:    "2",
            },
            &ast.IntLiteral{
              ValuePos: 30,
              ValueEnd: 31,
              Base:     10,
              Value:    "3",
            },
          },
        },
        Hint: (*ast.Hint)(nil),
        As:   &ast.AsAlias{
          As:    34,
          Alias: &ast.Ident{
            NamePos: 34,
            NameEnd: 39,
            Name:    "value",
          },
        },
        WithOffset: &ast.WithOffset{
          With:   40,
          Offset: 45,
          As:     &ast.AsAlias{
            As:    52,
            Alias: &ast.Ident{
              NamePos: 52,
              NameEnd: 55,
              Name:    "num",
            },
          },
        },
        Sample: (*ast.TableSample)(nil),
      },
    },
    Where:   (*ast.Where)(nil),
    GroupBy: (*ast.GroupBy)(nil),
    Having:  (*ast.Having)(nil),
    OrderBy: (*ast.OrderBy)(nil),
    Limit:   (*ast.Limit)(nil),
  },
}

--- SQL
SELECT * FROM UNNEST(ARRAY[1, 2, 3]) AS value WITH OFFSET AS num
